news.headline: Stocks drop as Prudential reports unexpected loss, surprising investors.
Mattel's Q4 results exceed expectations with earnings of 35 cents/share and $1.65 billion revenue. Stocks rise post-reports.
news.summary: Toy company Mattel, Inc. (NASDAQ: MAT) released its fourth-quarter financial results, surpassing expectations. Earnings for the quarter were reported at 35 cents per share, beating the analyst estimate of 20 cents. Quarterly revenue stood at $1.65 billion, exceeding the analyst consensus of $1.63 billion. This marked an increase from the $1.62 billion in sales during the same period the previous year. Gross billings in North America rose by 1% in both reported and constant currency, attributed to growth in the Vehicles segment.

news.headline: Bird Construction Inc. will release 2024 financial results on March 12 after market close, with a conference call on March 13.
news.summary: Bird Construction Inc., traded as BDT on the Toronto Stock Exchange, is set to unveil its financial performance for the fourth quarter and full year of 2024 on March 12, 2025, after the market closes. Subsequently, on March 13, 2025, a conference call and live webcast will take place at 10:00 a.m. (ET) to analyze the results.

news.headline: Major US refinery prepared to transition to US crude oil due to tariffs.
Bitdeer acquires 101 MW site & gas-fired power project in Alberta for $21.7 million; scalable to 1 GW.
news.summary: Bitdeer Technologies Group (NASDAQ: BTDR) has officially completed the acquisition of a 101 MW site and gas-fired power project in Fox Creek, Alberta. The transaction, valued at $21.7 million in all-cash, includes 19 acres of land. The site has the potential to expand to 1 GW of power, showcasing Alberta's plentiful energy resources, favorable regulatory environment, and business-friendly atmosphere. This purchase highlights Bitdeer's commitment to expanding its presence in the blockchain and high-performance computing sectors.

news.headline: Organigram will report Q1 fiscal 2025 results on Feb 11, 2025. Earnings for period ended Dec 31, 2024. Conference call at 8am.
news.summary: In Toronto, Organigram Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ: OGI) (TSX: OGI), the parent company of Organigram Inc., a prominent licensed cannabis producer, revealed plans to disclose earnings for Q1 fiscal 2025 ending on December 31, 2024, on February 11, 2025, before the market opens. A conference call will be held to review the results on the same day at 8:00 am Eastern Time.

news.headline: Australian companies are increasing ESG efforts for compliance and profit, investing in technology for sustainability and governance.
news.summary: Business Wire reported that Australian enterprises are increasingly focusing on technology investments to enhance their environmental and social sustainability as well as corporate governance. According to ISG, this trend highlights a growing concern for sustainability among businesses in the region. The exact figures were not disclosed, but the report emphasizes the significant impact technology is having on driving positive change in these areas for companies in Australia.

news.headline: NVIDIA rejects TRC Capital's "mini-tender" offer to buy 1,000,000 shares at $131.50 each, less than 0.01% of their stock.
news.summary: In Santa Clara, California, on February 4, 2025, NVIDIA has been informed of an unsolicited “mini-tender” bid from TRC Capital Investment Corporation. The offer, dated January 21, 2025, proposes to acquire a maximum of 1,000,000 shares of NVIDIA's common stock at $131.50 per share in cash. This bid accounts for less than 0.01% of NVIDIA’s total outstanding common stock.

news.headline: Tenant Inc. launches Mobile Manager & Auction Manager to enhance self-storage operations efficiency. Located in Newport Beach, Calif., released on Feb. 4, 2025, these features aim to improve field management and auction processes for compliance.
news.summary: In Newport Beach, California, on February 4, 2025, Tenant Inc. introduced new features in their Hummingbird Storage Facility Property Management Platform. These enhancements aim to improve field management and auction processes, boosting efficiency and compliance. Tenant Inc. is a top vertical SaaS platform, offering innovative solutions. The updates are designed to streamline operations and enhance overall performance. Users can expect increased productivity and adherence to regulations with these new functionalities.

news.headline: Lumen Tech (NYSE:LUMN) stocks soar post strong Q4 earnings: Revenue $3.33B (est. $3.2B), EPS 9 cents (vs. exp. loss of 5 cents). Company building AI economy backbone.
news.summary: Lumen Technologies Inc (NYSE:LUMN) announced strong financial performance for the fourth quarter. The company reported a Q4 revenue of $3.33 billion, exceeding estimates of $3.2 billion. Additionally, their Q4 Adjusted EPS stood at 9 cents, compared to an estimated loss of 5 cents. Lumen revealed that net cash from operations for the quarter reached $688 million, with free cash flow at negative $174 million. The company closed the quarter with $1.89 billion. More details can be found on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: Stingray's Q3 results for Fiscal 2025 surpass expectations, with strong adjusted EBITDA and record revenues.
news.summary: Surpasses projections with robust adjusted EBITDA¹ and achieves all-time high revenues.

news.headline: North American Construction Group Ltd. will release Q4 results on March 5, 2025, with conference call on March 6 at 7:00 AM MST.
news.summary: ACHESON, Alberta - North American Construction Group Ltd. (known as NACG) will be reporting its financial results for the fourth quarter ending December 31, 2024, after markets close on Wednesday, March 5, 2025. The company's stocks are listed as TSX:NOA.TO/NYSE:NOA. A conference call and webcast discussing these results are scheduled for Thursday, March 6, 2025, at 7:00 a.m. Mountain Time (9:00 a.m. Eastern Time). NACG is expected to divulge important figures during this event which are crucial for investors and stakeholders.

news.headline: S. Korean CPI YoY Actual 2.2% (Forecast 2.1%, Previous 1.90%)
South Korea Jan CPI Excluding Food and Energy Rises 1.9% Year on Year
South Korea Sees 0.7% Month on Month Rise in Consumer Prices in January; Estimate was +0.5%
S. Korean CPI MoM Actual 0.7% (Forecast 0.5%, Previous 0.40%)
South Korea Sees 2.2% Year on Year Rise in January Consumer Prices, Exceeding Estimated 2.1%
New robots display incredible agility, mimicking movements of Ronaldo and James.
news.summary: A recent report indicates that the unemployment rate has dropped to 4.5%, down from 5.2% last month. This brings the total number of unemployed individuals to 7.3 million. Additionally, the economy added 600,000 new jobs last month, surpassing economists' expectations. The labor force participation rate increased to 62.5%, showing positive signs of economic recovery. With these improvements, the outlook for the job market appears optimistic in the coming months.

news.headline: Teck Resources (TSX: TECK.A, TECK.B, NYSE: TECK) to report Q4 2024 results on Feb 20, 2025.
news.summary: Teck Resources Limited, based in Vancouver, British Columbia, is set to disclose its financial performance for the fourth quarter of 2024 on February 20, 2025. This announcement will be made prior to the market opening. Teck is listed under the tickers TECK.A and TECK.B on the Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX) and on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) under the ticker TECK. The company's earnings report for the specific period will provide insights into its financial health and operational performance.

news.headline: Allied Water partners with Norweco to distribute septic tanks, serving septic installation companies, offering high-quality ATUs.
news.summary: In Manteno, Illinois, Allied Water Service has partnered exclusively with Norweco, a renowned manufacturer of advanced wastewater treatment systems. Allied Water Service, a prominent provider of septic, sewer, and waterproofing solutions, will now be the primary distributor of Norweco's top-tier aerobic treatment units (ATU). This collaboration targets septic installation companies and wastewater experts, offering them access to Norweco's superior products. The alliance signifies a significant step for both companies in the sector.

news.headline: OMB Bank launches OMBX, an embedded finance platform, with 7 clients and more in pipeline, aiming to become a premier partner.
news.summary: In Springfield, Missouri, OMB Bank has introduced OMBX, a specialized embedded finance department aimed at supporting fintechs and digital businesses with integrated banking services. OMBX has already collaborated with seven fintech clients and has additional partnerships in progress, positioning it as a leading embedded finance ally. The unveiling of OMBX's official website, ombx.com, signifies a pivotal advancement in their commitment to offering scalable banking solutions to clients.

news.headline: Nasdaq and small caps lead markets; Costco hits new high, in buy zone. Live coverage from Investor's Business Daily.
news.summary: On Tuesday, the Nasdaq outperformed other major indexes. Costco surged to a record high and is currently within a buy zone. The stock market today displayed noteworthy activity, with the Nasdaq and small caps leading the way. Costco was one of the several companies experiencing breakout moments amidst the lively trading session.

news.headline: Asian stocks set to rise following US market surge as China reopens; latest market updates.
Valero Energy Corporation priced $650 million in 5.150% Senior Notes due 2030 for general corporate purposes.
news.summary: Valero Energy Corporation (NYSE: VLO) has disclosed a public offering of $650 million aggregate principal amount of 5.150% Senior Notes due 2030. The offering is set to conclude on February 7, 2025, pending customary closing conditions. The company plans to utilize the net proceeds for various general corporate uses, such as the repayment, repurchase, or redemption of its existing 3.650% Senior Notes due.

news.headline: Match Group Q4 revenue slightly higher than estimated at $860M with 59 cents EPS, but facing selling pressure due to CEO transition.
news.summary: Match Group Inc (NASDAQ: MTCH) is experiencing a drop in share value during after-hours trading due to its announcement of fourth-quarter financial results and a CEO transition. The company reported Q4 revenue of $860 million, slightly surpassing the estimated $858.84 million. Q4 EPS amounted to 59 cents, exceeding the estimated 55 cents. Total revenue decreased by 1% year-over-year with a 4% decrease in payers to 14.6 million. Tinder revenue saw a 3% decline while Hinge revenue surged by 27% year-over-year. Additionally, revenue within the Evergreen and Emerging category dropped by 8% year-over-year. This news is available in detail on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: Merck stock drops 9% as investors react negatively to 2025 guidance despite Q4 beat. #Merckstock #investorsreaction
news.summary: Shares of Merck took a hit on Tuesday as investors reacted strongly to the company exceeding fourth-quarter forecasts but providing a weak outlook for 2025. The stock plummeted by 9% following these announcements. The decline was influenced by concerns surrounding Gardasil dynamics and the company's guidance for the upcoming years.

news.headline: AMD exceeded Q4 estimates and raised guidance; stock fell despite positive report.
news.summary: In the fourth quarter, chipmaker AMD surpassed expectations and provided a higher guidance for the next period. Despite this positive news, the stock fell following the release of the report.

news.headline: Amgen stock dropped after FDA placed its obesity drug on clinical hold, causing concern for the biotech company.
news.summary: Shares of Amgen tumbled on Tuesday following news that the FDA has placed a clinical hold on one of the company's obesity treatments. The biotech giant experienced a surprise setback, causing its stock to drop. This development impacted Amgen's overall performance in the market, leading to a significant decline in its stock value. This news marks a setback for the company as it navigates the regulatory landscape for its pharmaceutical products. The specific drug affected by the FDA's decision was not disclosed in the reports. Investors and analysts are closely monitoring the situation, with the stock market reacting to this unexpected turn of events for Amgen.

news.headline: Chipotle's earnings met expectations, but guidance fell short due to avocado cost inflation in Q4.
news.summary: The rising cost of avocados contributed to an increase in expenses for Chipotle during the fourth quarter. The latest earnings report from Chipotle largely met analysts' expectations, but fell short of guidance. The company experienced challenges due to inflation, with avocado prices remaining a key concern.

news.headline: Snap stock rises after parent company beats Q4 earnings/sales expectations. Positive results reported.
news.summary: Stock prices of Snap rose following the announcement of fourth-quarter earnings and sales that exceeded expectations by the parent company of Snapchat. This positive news led to a surge in Snap's stock, indicating a favorable market reaction. The details regarding the exact numbers and percentage of the increase were not provided in the rephrased information.

news.headline: Google's earnings meet estimates as stock tumbles; Q4 revenue slightly below views. 2025 Capital Spending Outlook concerns Wall Street.
news.summary: The stock of Google's parent company, Alphabet, took a hit following the release of Q4 earnings that slightly surpassed analysts' predictions, though revenue fell slightly short of expectations. The post-earnings report revealed that Google's earnings were in line with estimates, but the market was spooked by the Capital Spending Outlook for 2025. The stock price declined in response to the earnings report.

news.headline: Buenaventura settles cash tender offer for all of its 5.500% Senior Notes due 2026. Announcement made in Lima, Peru on Feb. 4, 2025. BVN (NYSE) announced the settlement.
news.summary: In Lima, Peru on February 4, 2025, Compañía de Minas Buenaventura S.A.A. ("Buenaventura") (NYSE: BVN) disclosed the completion of the cash tender offer (Tender Offer) for all of its 5.500% Senior Notes due 2026 (the Notes). This offer covered all outstanding Notes, with the 144A CUSIP / ISIN number being 20448...

news.headline: Quarterly and annual earnings for 2024 have been released by NOV.
US AI Safety Institute leader exits amid Trump's policy change.
SEC scales back enforcement efforts on cryptocurrencies: NYT
Canadian company Neptune Digital Assets acquires 1M Dogecoin to add to its expanding Bitcoin reserve.
news.summary: On Tuesday, Neptune Digital Assets, a company based in Canada, revealed that it had purchased a significant amount of Dogecoin in addition to the increasing collection of Bitcoin held in its corporate reserves.

news.headline: Lorikeet receives $9 million funding amid high market demand for AI support agents, expanding platform and market reach.
news.summary: Lorikeet, a leader in AI customer experience solutions, has secured new funding to enhance its platform and increase its market reach. The funding will support the company's efforts to assist more businesses in complex and regulated sectors by enabling them to utilize AI agents for delivering high-quality customer support at a large scale. The announcement was made in Sydney on February 4, 2025. This development underscores Lorikeet's commitment to innovating in the field of AI technology to benefit a wider range of industries.

news.headline: S.E.C. reassigns 50 lawyers from the unit regulating crypto, scaling back enforcement efforts.
news.summary: Approximately 50 lawyers and staff members from a dedicated unit responsible for overseeing cryptocurrency regulation are being reassigned within the agency.

news.headline: In Boston, four industry experts now join The Possible Zone board, enhancing youth preparedness for future careers.
news.summary: Boston-based entrepreneurial program TPZ has recently welcomed four industry experts to its team. The program aims to equip young individuals with the necessary skills for future careers through hands-on learning. This comes as part of TPZ’s dedication to fostering lifelong learning among Boston’s youth.

news.headline: New AI model MUSK from Stanford improving cancer diagnosis and treatment, outperforming with higher accuracy and prediction.
news.summary: Researchers at Stanford University have created an AI model called MUSK, which improves cancer diagnosis and treatment by analyzing multiple types of data. This model has shown superior accuracy and predictive capabilities compared to current models.

news.headline: Japan is considering stricter rules for Management Buyouts to safeguard minority shareholders.
news.summary: An alarming number of cases of COVID-19 have been reported in the country. The total number of confirmed cases has surpassed 100,000, with 5,000 deaths recorded. Health officials are urging citizens to adhere to safety guidelines such as wearing masks, practicing social distancing, and frequent handwashing to curb the spread of the virus. The government is considering implementing stricter measures to control the situation. Additionally, hospitals are reportedly overwhelmed with patients, leading to concerns about the healthcare system's capacity. Experts are warning that the situation could worsen if preventive measures are not strictly followed.

news.headline: Nine Energy Service to announce Q4 and full-year 2024 earnings, along with conference call, in Houston.
news.summary: Nine Energy Service has revealed that they will be releasing their financial results for the fourth quarter and full year of 2024. The earnings report will be made public along with a conference call to discuss the financial details. This announcement was made in Houston.

news.headline: Treasury reports Musk's team has ‘read-only’ access to payment data.
Monarch Casino & Resort (NASDAQ: MCRI) to report 2024 Q4 results on Feb 11, 2025 after market close. (Numbers: 2024, Feb 11, 2025)
news.summary: Monarch Casino & Resort, Inc. (NASDAQ: MCRI) from Reno, Nevada, revealed it will disclose its financial performance for the fourth quarter of 2024 after markets close on Tuesday, February 11, 2025. The announcement was made on February 4, 2025.

news.headline: Spectrum Brands Holdings declares $0.47 quarterly dividend per share for Common Stock, payable on March 11, 2025.
news.summary: Middleton, Wisconsin - Spectrum Brands Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: SPB) has declared a quarterly dividend of $0.47 per share on its Common Stock. The dividend will be paid out on March 11, 2025, to shareholders recorded as of February 18, 2025. Spectrum Brands Holdings, Inc. is a company dedicated to enhancing home living experiences by providing innovative products and solutions for consumers.

news.headline: Global peptide-drug conjugate market set for 29% CAGR growth by 2032, driven by rising cancer cases. Peptide-based therapies offer targeted treatment with lower toxicity.
news.summary: The growing worldwide incidence of cancer is driving the need for peptide-drug conjugates as targeted therapies, offering enhanced efficacy and reduced systemic toxicity compared to traditional treatments. The rising adoption of peptide-based therapeutics is also supported by an increase in their usage, as they continue to gain popularity for their effectiveness in treating various health conditions.

news.headline: Tracy Dufault of Walmart named 2025 Presidential Leadership Scholar; one of 57 scholars in the 10th annual class.
news.summary: In Bentonville, Arkansas, Tracy Dufault, the Senior Vice President of Merchandising Operations at Walmart U.S., has recently been selected as one of 57 Scholars for the 10th annual class of the Presidential Leadership Scholars (PLS) program. Over the last ten years, PLS has assembled over 500 leaders from various backgrounds to work together and create an impact globally. Participants gain insights on leadership by studying the presidential tenures of George W. Bush, William J. Clinton, and George H.W. Bush.

news.headline: US AI safety institute leader to resign this week
Grupo Aeroportuario del Pacífico issued Ps. 6.0 billion in bond certificates in Mexico through two tranches, with an oversubscription of 3.4x.
news.summary: In Guadalajara, on February 4, 2025, Grupo Aeroportuario del Pacífico, S.A.B. de C.V., (NYSE:PAC; BMV: GAP) ("the Company" or "GAP") has successfully concluded the offering of 60 million long-term bond certificates in Mexico (Certificados Bursátiles) totaling Ps. 6.0 billion. The issuance comprised two tranches, initially set at Ps. 5.0 billion with a greenshoe option of up to 20%, which was fully exercised at closing. The demand surpassed expectations, reaching 3.4 times the initial offering amount of Ps. 5.0 billion.

news.headline: Allied Properties REIT reports steady occupancy and rent growth in Q4 2024, expects to increase area and rent in 2025. CEO optimistic.
news.summary: Allied Properties Real Estate Investment Trust (AP.UN) disclosed their financial outcomes for the fourth quarter and full year ending on December 31, 2024. The occupied and leased area retained stability for the third consecutive quarter. President & CEO Cecilia Williams stated that the urban workspace portfolio excelled in occupancy and rent escalation across all urban submarkets except for Vancouver. With a surge in demand in cities and across their three workspace formats, Allied anticipates augmenting both occupied and leased area, consequently boosting rent growth during 2025.
